annotation.spannedText: Vaccines are protecting more children than ever before

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccines are protecting more children than ever before

annotation.spannedText: Vaccines keep children alive and healthy by protecting them against disease

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccines keep children alive and healthy by protecting them against disease

annotation.spannedText: Immunization is especially important for the hardest to reach families as it can also be a bridge to other life-saving care for mothers and children in isolated communities – such as child nutritional screening, anti-malarial mosquito nets, vitamin A supplements and de-worming tablets

classMention.mentionClass: Immunization is especially important for the hardest to reach families as it can also be a bridge to other life-saving care for mothers and children in isolated communities – such as child nutritional screening, anti-malarial mosquito nets, vitamin A supplements and de-worming tablets

annotation.spannedText: Immunization is one of the most successful and cost-effective public health investments we can make for future generations

classMention.mentionClass: Immunization is one of the most successful and cost-effective public health investments we can make for future generations

annotation.spannedText: if immunization is not prioritized, the most marginalized children will not get vaccines, which could mean the difference between life and death

classMention.mentionClass: if immunization is not prioritized, the most marginalized children will not get vaccines, which could mean the difference between life and death
